title: User can create a new task
description: As a user, I want to be able to create a new task with a title, description, due date, priority, and status.
acceptanceCriteria: The system should allow the user to enter a title for the task.
The system should allow the user to enter a description for the task.
The system should allow the user to specify a due date for the task.
The system should allow the user to select a priority level (high, medium, low) for the task.
The system should allow the user to set the status of the task as 'in progress', 'completed', or 'deferred'.
